item.title: Riddey, your online canvas of Innovation!
item.description: Riddey.Set.Go - Introducing Riddey, your online canvas of Innovation! With technology at the forefront of all work functionality, effective collaboration is more crucial than ever. That’s why we’re excited to introduce Riddey, your new go-to online virtual whiteboard. With Riddey, you can empower your teams to collaborate from anywhere in the world, foster creativity, and streamline your creative processes, all while enjoying an array of innovative features designed to make your work easier and more productive.

item.title: Why is it Hard to Draw with a Mouse and What Can You Do About It?
item.description: Were you a big-time whiteboard user before the work-from-home era? And now, do you just talk and gesture in Zoom meetings instead of using an online whiteboard? If so, you are not alone—many don’t even bother because they feel it is too difficult. Have you ever wondered why? To start things off, here is a personal story some might relate to. After the pandemic hit, I had a video meeting with one of my friends.
